title: Smoke in the Woods
desc: Someone reports observing unusual smoke coming out of the woods

cards.title: Do Nothing
cards.cons: You think it's not a big deal and decide not to worry about it

cards.title: Ask a Ranger
cards.desc: Hey, you know what's going on?
cards.cons: The ranger decide to check it out himself

cards.title: Let Me See
cards.desc: I'll go and have a look
cards.cons: You decide to travel to the woods

title: FIRE!
desc: The smoke in the woods turns out to be a FIRE!

cards.title: Tries to Stop the Fire Yourself
cards.desc: That is very Brave of Me Indeed
